hackathon-description-text: Creating innovative software and hardware prototypes to make the world better.
hackathon-requirements: Make sure to include all of the following information in your team submission

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 300 € to be transferred after the event
300 € to be transferred after the event
300 € to be transferred after the event
Amazon Echos to be sent after the event
Philips Hue kits to be sent after the event

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How innovative is the use of the technology? Has it been used in a new and smart way or have major technological barriers been overcome to create something awesome?
How well do users interact with the system or solution? Has a new way of interaction been found or does it lead the way with innovative design?
Does the solution create a community where people connect or help each other in new ways? Does it improve the way in which people communicate or improve our way of living?

Special challenge presented by Amazon:
For disrupting use cases using the voice interaction of Amazon Echo
Special challenge presented by Philips: For projects with new and interesting uses of the Philips Hue kit.

hackathon-description-header: Creating innovative software and hardware prototypes to make the world better.
